lines.text: Look friend, no one puts the rush on Machine Gun Kelly's girl.
Now, now, Kelly. You want to shoot it out with Johnny Dillinger you better go outside. Don't you go messin' around on my new furniture.
[Dillinger laughs at Kelly's shocked face]
Why you old battle axe we wouldn't give you a-
Oh sweet child! You say that again and I'll rattle your tonsils till that mink turns into the rabbit it is! I've got no time for cheats or...phony blondes!
Show him boys
Where did you get these?
Out of the collection plate.
Without anyone being the wiser. That took guts!
How long has this been going on?
Oh a couple of weeks. It was their own idea. I thought it was kinda cute.
Pretty slick, eh Pop?
What kind of mother are you?! Letting your sons steal from church!
Not letting them, George, encouraging them.
Lou, honey, let's get lost while Ma and Kelly talk business.

[laughing]
Oh Kelly, no wonder you like to take Lou with you wherever you go.
I don't getcha Ma.
She leads real easy
You're much older than I thought, may I call you grandma?
I ain't a grandma yet. I keep my boys away from the likes of you.
Lou honey, Ma sure toppped you that time.
Are you offering any cash?
Of course we are. Lou figured we'd pay about-

[interrupts]
Not one red cent!
But honey you said 50 grand.
That was before we found Ma alone.
I never heard of such a thing! Trying to steal another mob's kidnap, why, it ain't honest!
You're in no spot to refuse Ma.
Do you want to gamble on that?
Can you beat four of a kind?
Depends on how big they are.
I'd call them aces
Oh honey, you've enver been known to be very bright.
[laughs]
They look more like jokers to me!
You're slippin Ma. A joker is still an ace.
Not in Texas poker! We strip out the joker and that's just what I'm going to do with your bad hand.
[calls]
Fred!
[Steps out with a machine gun]
That's a pretty low card Ma.
Well, maybe I'd better draw another.
[calls]
Karpis!
[he steps out with another machine gun]

[Kelly pulls out a handgun]
You better draw your limit Ma, and fast. I'm losing patience.

[calls]
Baby Face Nelson!
[There is a pause while Kelly realized they are outnumbered]
And if Fred and Karpis and Baby Face and me ain't enough, I've got a wild card, a real wild card...
[calls]
Johnny Dillinger
[he fires off a round at the ground near their feet]
Fives beat fours, I'd say that Ma has the best hand.

[Laughing]
After this, folks'll be callin you 'Pop' Gun Kelly!

Don't you go tryin to deny it. I told Al and the boys if you shot off your bourbon mouth at that bar and got us in dutch I was going to finish you. I was going to do something about it! Now finish your pie.
Oh..now Ma
[nervous laughter]
, you wouldn't do anything...foolish. Not to me...why after all, I'm your...I'm your husband!
I'm just about to divorce you, the quick way.

[Ma grabs Lou's mink wrap, throws it on the ground and shoots it]
Well why did you do that?!
Thought I saw it move and I didn't want it to bite you.
